SKT_FIRST.name: Twin Fireball
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: ツインファイアーボール
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태로 만듭니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Flame Blast
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태로 만듭니다. (2회 적용)
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>35%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を最大2個<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 火傷状態の対象に\nダメージUP

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Elemental Burst
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: エレメンタルバースト
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nDeals increased damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n대상이 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태라면 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、敵に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
